Of all the priority positions for recruiting this transfer window, arguably none were as critical as left-back. articles.description:
Photo by Craig Williamson/SNS Group via Getty Images
  

 Celtic ran out 4-2 winners in Czech Republic after a hard fought contest with FC Banik Ostrava, who celebrated their centenary year in the process.
Here’s the goals in what is a fairly high quality package you rarely see on Youtube:

Kyogo, O’Riley, Giakoumakis and Abada all got on the scoresheet for the hoops.
A live reaction on 67HailHail followed the game with the lads, which can you also enjoy below:

The latest on Jackanory Corner is this french guy Edouard Michut who is apparently close to signing: 
https://www.glasgowtimes.co.uk/sport/20275614.celtic-target-edouard-michut-transfer-ange-postecoglous-side-set-offer-2m-bid/
We’ll hold off with any exclusives and ‘what you should know’ about him before there’s something more substantial than Fabrizio Romano’s tweets.
articles.title: Banik Ostrava 2-4 Celtic : Goals & Reaction

articles.description:
Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou has named his starting 11 for this evening’s pre-season fixture against Banik Ostrava in the Czech Republic. The full match squad is as follows: Starting XI – Hart, Juranovic, Carter-Vickers, Welsh, Taylor, McGregor, O’Riley, Turnbull, Forrest, Jota, Kyogo Substitutes – Bain, Siegrist, Oluwayemi, Jullien, Giakoumakis, Ajeti, Abada, McCarthy, Johnston, Ideguchi, Kenny, Bernabei, Urhoghide, ...

articles.description: Pre-season can be an utter waste for a club like Celtic. It can be an utter waste when it’s being used simply to get players fit, or build confidence running up cricket scores against mediocre teams. Celtic has opted to ignore both options this summer. We’ve gone for tough encounters against sides capable of giving […]
articles.title: Celtic Name The Team For Tonight’s Game Against Another Tough Opponent.

Celtic are close to the end of the pre-season training camp, with Wednesday night’s match the final before returning to Paradise. The Hoops will play Baník Ostrava which is celebrating its 100th anniversary. A decent home support is expected, with the Croatian side’s ultras selling out their section behind the goals.  After a thrilling encounter […]

Every single Celtic fan has, at one time or another, glanced […]

articles.description:
Well, that’s us back at More than 90 Minutes Celtic Fanzine HQ after our summer break as we get ready for another season following Celtic FC. articles.description:
Later this evening, Celtic will face their third pre-season-friendly fixture as they take on Banik Ostrava. An incredible admission from Calmac! On the excitement of the new Read More

articles.description: The era from 1945-1951 is not much cherished or loved by Celtic supporters. articles.title: Ange Postecoglou satisfied as Celtic blow away 'pre-season cobwebs' in Banik Ostrava win

articles.description: CELTIC wrapped up their pre-season tour with a 4-2 win over Czech outfit Bank Ostrava.
articles.title: Hart-in-mouth moments and O'Riley runs the show: Talking points from Celtic's friendly win

articles.description: CELTIC crashed Banik Ostrava’s party to round off their pre-season training camp in style, as goals from Kyogo, Matt O’Riley, Giorgos Giakoumakis and Liel Abada gave them a deserved win in the Czech Republic.
articles.title: Celtic crash the party to bring curtain down on pre-season camp in style

articles.description: CELTIC are facing Banik Ostrava in the final friendly of their pre-season tour and local supporters have turned up in their thousands ahead of kick-off.
articles.title: Watch: Banik Ostrava fans generate incredible atmosphere ahead of Celtic friendly

articles.description: CELTIC continue their pre-season schedule in Austria this afternoon with a friendly against Banik Ostrava.
articles.title: Celtic team news as Ange Postecoglou names side to face Banik Ostrava

articles.description: CELTIC are targeting a move for PSG midfielder Edouard Michut, according to reports.
articles.title: Celtic target Edouard Michut PSG transfer as Ange Postecoglou's side set to offer £2m bid

articles.description: STEPHEN ROBINSON has provided a transfer update on St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid.
articles.title: Dylan Reid Celtic transfer update as Stephen Robinson reveals 'decisions' that must be made

articles.description: THERE are certain misconceptions that people may have about Cameron Carter-Vickers by virtue of his imposing physical stature. He isn’t called ‘The Fridge’ because he is cool under pressure, though that is one of the attributes that has made him such a good fit for Ange Postecoglou’s Celtic.
articles.title: Cameron Carter-Vickers thanks parents and Tottenham mentor as gentle giant expresses gratitude for Celtic opportunity

articles.description: FORMER Celtic midfielder Peter Grant reckons that one of Scotland's three  domestic cup competitions should be scrapped - as the congested fixture list is having an adverse effect on lower league clubs and the national team.
articles.title: Former Celtic midfielder Peter Grant calls for domestic cup competition to be axed

articles.description: CALLUM McGREGOR says that Celtic are hoping to pull Real Madrid out of the hat in the Champions League, with the club captain aiming for personal redemption against Luka Modric.
articles.title: Celtic skipper Callum McGregor targets Luka Modric revenge mission in Champions League

articles.description: CELTIC defender Boli Bolingoli has completed a permanent move to Belgian top-flight outfit KV Mechelen.
articles.title: Celtic outcast Boli Bolingoli seals KV Mechelen move

articles.description: CELTIC are reportedly planning a pre-season trip to Japan next summer.
articles.title: Celtic 'planning' Japan 2023 pre-season tour

articles.description: MATT O’RILEY says that Celtic expect their rivals to come back at them stronger next season, but that will be irrelevant if Ange Postecoglou’s team play to their potential.
articles.title: Matt O’Riley expects rivals to roar back, but thinks Celtic will have too much for the competition

articles.description: THE movement of Kyogo has left many a defender dizzy since he burst onto the scene at Celtic last season, but his speed is such that it is often difficult even for his own teammates to keep up with him.
articles.title: Kyogo is even a step ahead of Celtic teammates says David Turnbull, as he relishes link-up with striker next season

articles.description: WITH the greatest of respect to MK Dons, the rise of their former captain Matt O’Riley has been a remarkable one over the past six months or so. Not only has the young midfielder become an integral member of the Celtic squad, but he may well find himself at the World Cup come the end of the year.
articles.title: Matt O’Riley aiming to cap off Celtic rise with World Cup place – with a little help from Morten Wieghorst

articles.description: SCOTT BAIN is set to remain at Celtic this season due to Champions League ruling.
articles.title: Scott Bain's Celtic summer transfer conundrum as Champions League ruling set to make his decision

articles.description: CELTIC continue pre-season preparations with a trip to face Banik Ostrava on Wednesday.
articles.title: Celtic vs Banik Ostrava: TV channel, live stream, kick-off time

articles.description: TOM ROGIC has been pictured in Sydney with uncertainty surrounding his future.
articles.title: Tom Rogic transfer latest as Celtic hero pictured following Australia boss Graham Arnold's 'concerns'

articles.description: CELTIC will reportedly hold contract talks with St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid today.
articles.title: Dylan Reid to Celtic latest as Ange Postecoglou to sell move to St Mirren youngster

articles.description: JAMES FORREST is a player who, it would be fair to say, has sometimes split opinion among the Celtic fanbase during his long career at the club. For a winger, it comes with the territory.
articles.title: James Forrest not content with making up the numbers at Celtic as winger looks to become main player for Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: KYOGO has set himself a minimum target of 20 goals next season as he looks to wrest the title of Scotland’s top scorer away from teammate Giorgos Giakoumakis.
articles.title: Kyogo sets goal target as he vows to oust Celtic teammate from top of scoring charts
